ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Cha
ygData.msgSnippet: I think like other stats it depends on where your STA is when you raise it. I m pretty sure I get more than 6 hp s from my crested spaulders but I ll check
ygData.messageBody:
I think like other stats it depends on where your STA is when you raise it.
I'm pretty sure I get more than 6 hp's from my crested spaulders but I'll
check tonite. My stamina is below the 75 threshold though.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Papa Legba [mailto:legba@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 05, 2000 10:58 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Cha


I'm with you on the EULA. I sent out an email to my regular group that
they won't be seeing me this Thurs. They're not happy to say the least,
I'm the only healer in the group.

As for STA bonused, my roomate is a 21 warrior, I will have him check
the effect of +4 sta (from 2 earrings), When last he checked it was as
bad as my cleric's bonus. I really think STA is another pretty useless
stat in the game...
--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
